Accomplished professional athlete and accredited fitness expert, personal coach and mentor to more than 6000 clients over 25 years
Introduced enterprise wide strategies that increased department revenues by 1000% using software and techniques for tracking results and client profile management
Gained recognition during a Hackathon hosted by LinkedIn in Toronto 2013. Built a Google Chrome Extension that extracts data from your LinkedIn Profile and performs a search for Jobs on LinkedIn.

Resume.SummaryObjectives: A strong track record of startup, growth, increased sales and long term relationship management. 20 years of business development experience in multiple lines of business and industries. The ability to effectively lead, train, coach and mentor in all levels of the SDLC and PMLC and long sales cycles using a consultative approach. Focused on Technology, Information and Fitness since 1990. Dedicated to maintaining up-to-date development techniques and technology infrastructure through leadership and collaborative team projects and organizational initiatives.
Resume.TagLine: A motivated leader with a unique blend of experience and technical savvy Able to travel and make high level presentations
